original_text:
that he would argue the case of a man with God,
    as a son of man does with his neighbor.
korean_text: 사람과 하나님 사이에와 인자와 그 이웃 사이에 중재하시기를 원하노니

sentences.original_text: that he would argue the case of a man with God
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 한 사람의 사정을 가지고 하나님과 변론하기를

sentences.original_text: as a son of man does with his neighbor.
